item.description:
CIPNE Lecture with Photographer Christopher Wilson

How Christopher Wilson Reinvented Himself As A Commercial Photographer
After Fifteen Years As An Advertising Creative And Much To His Surprise Became Successful At It...

After 15 years in the advertising world as a writer, art director and designer, Christopher Wilson jumped off a cliff in 2003 to start christopherWILSONphotography.

As an advertising creative, Christopher created a vast portfolio of powerful branding communications for some of the most recognized luxury brands on the planet, including Audi, Infiniti, Jaguar, Nikon, Johnnie Walker and Ritz-Carlton to name only a very few – much of which can be viewed at www.christopherWILSONcreative.com.

Now Christopher is bringing all that experience and passion to his photography – and it shows. In five short years Christopher has leapt from agency creative to global photographer, shooting for an assortment of clients (including Ritz-Carlton, Morgan Stanley, Ford and NASCAR,) and in just about every country on the planet it seems –
India, Singapore, South Africa, Ethiopia, Rwanda, Morocco, United Arab Emirates, Brazil, England, you name it, he’s probably shot there.

Christopher will spend the evening talking about how he made his successful transition from agency creative to commercial photographer, and how having an agency background has given him a distinct advantage in obtaining work as a photographer.

This is going to be an excellent program, please join us for networking, food, and a great evening discussion about photography. For more details stay tuned and check out the CIPNE.org web site for all the details and how to register.

Space is limited so please RSVP - ASAP.
You must RSVP to this event at the http://www.cipne.org... web site. This is not a worcester photo meetup event.
Save the date!!

Free to CIPNE members - Non Members $35.00 (this is very worth the cost!- don't miss this!)

Conference Center at Bentley College
La Cava Center- Danielson Room
175 Forest Street
Waltham, MA
781-891-2106
scott@erbphoto.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Must See Lecture by Top Photographer and Creative Voice Christopher Wilson!
